AlwaysSide Clock is your ultimate time management companion for Chrome! It sits conveniently in your browser's side panel, offering an elegant, customizable clock that displays time in different time zones. With additional features like motivational quotes, alarms, and quick-access bookmarks, AlwaysSide Clock makes your browsing experience both productive and inspiring. Stay organized and on time no matter where you are!

Key Features:

⏰ Customizable Clock: Set clocks for multiple time zones and choose between 12-hour or 24-hour formats.
🌍 Automatic Location Detection: Always display the current time for your location without manual setup.
🔄 Real-Time Time Syncing: Clocks update in real-time to keep you in sync with the world.
📜 Motivational Quotes: Get inspired with rotating motivational quotes to keep your productivity up.
🔔 Alarm Functionality: Set alarms for important events with a simple, intuitive interface.
🎨 Custom Themes: Switch between dark and light themes for a visually pleasing experience.
📝 Sticky Notes: Quickly jot down important notes and reminders within the side panel.
📑 Bookmarks: Save and access your favorite websites with a single click.
⚙️ Easy Settings: Configure clock display, timezone, and other settings with ease.
Why You’ll Love It:

AlwaysSide Clock keeps you organized with everything you need at your fingertips.
Perfect for frequent travelers, remote workers, and anyone managing tasks across multiple time zones.
Lightweight, non-intrusive, and seamlessly integrated into your browser.
Make time work for you with AlwaysSide Clock!
